text:
During the [[Last War]], the Raven Corps was a [[Seeker|Blood of Vol]] spy organization that served [[Karrnath]]. They were an elite unit who specialized in gathering intelligence through the use of [[necromancy]]â€”interrogating corpses, using [[shadow]]s as spies, and so on. They were outfitted with [[cloaks of the bat|cloak of the bat]] which drained a bit of their blood in order to function.

The Raven Corps was a volunteer force, and was disavowed and disbanded at the same time as the [[Emerald Claw]] and other Seeker orders.
title: Raven Corps
